dial.docs:
Dial to a phone recipient using this action in automations.

*See also: [`sim800l.dial` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-dial-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the SIM800L if you have multiple components.

*See also: [on_ussd_received Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-dial-action)*

recipient.docs:
**, string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The number to dial.

*See also: [on_ussd_received Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-dial-action)*

disconnect.docs:
Disconnects a call, either dialed in or received.

*See also: [`sim800l.disconnect` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-disconnect-action)*

send_sms.docs:
Send a SMS message to a phone recipient using this action in automations.

*See also: [`sim800l.send_sms` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-send-sms-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the SIM800L if you have multiple components.

*See also: [on_ussd_received Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-send-sms-action)*

recipient.docs:
**, string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The message recipient. number.

*See also: [on_ussd_received Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-send-sms-action)*

send_ussd.docs:
Sends a ussd code to the network.

*See also: [`sim800l.send_ussd` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-send-ussd-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

on_call_connected.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when a call is connected, either because an outgoing call accepted is accepted or an incoming call answered.

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

on_call_disconnected.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when a call is disconnected.

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

on_incoming_call.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when a call is received. See [on_incoming_call Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-on-incoming-call).

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

on_sms_received.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when an SMS is received. See [on_sms_received Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sim800l-on-sms-received).

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the UART hub.

*See also: [sim800l Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#component-hub)*

registered.docs:
Indicates if the SIM800L has successfully registered in the cellular network.
  * All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [sim800l Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#binary-sensor)*

rssi.docs:
The informed Received signal strength indication (RSSI) in dBm.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [sim800l Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sim800l.html#sensor)*
